summary.span: 为远程调用实现使用 HTTP 协议传输消息的客户端信道。

span.span: Implements a client channel for remote calls that uses the HTTP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] 通道跨远程处理边界传输消息 (例如，在计算机或应用程序域) 之间传输消息。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers or application domains). 类使用 HTTP 协议传输消息。The class transports messages using the HTTP protocol. 通道由 .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构用于传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端调用远程对象时，调用将被序列化为客户端通道发送并由服务器通道接收的消息。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然后对其进行反序列化和处理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何返回值由服务器通道传输并由客户端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 对象具有关联的配置属性，这些属性可在运行时在配置文件中设置 (方法是：调用静态 方法) 或通过将集合传递 到 构造函数) 以编程方式 (。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 有关这些配置属性的列表，请参阅 [通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For a list of these configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 设置远程处理服务器及其客户端。The following code example shows how to use a to set up a remoting server and its client. 该示例包含三个部分：The example contains three parts: - 服务器A server - 客户端A client - 服务器和客户端使用的远程对象A remote object used by the server and the client 下面的代码示例演示了一个服务器。The following code example shows a server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/server.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/server.cs#40)] 下面的代码示例演示了此服务器的客户端。The following code example shows a client for this server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/client.cs#10)] 下面的代码示例显示了服务器和客户端使用的远程对象。The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/common.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/common.cs#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider clientSinkProvider, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider serverSinkProvider) cil managed
Public Sub New (properties As IDictionary, clientSinkProvider As IClientChannelSinkProvider, serverSinkProvider As IServerChannelSinkProvider)

param.name: properties
param.span: 一个 集合，它为客户端和服务器信道要使用的配置属性指定值。

span.span: A collection that specifies values for configuration properties to be used by the client and server channels.

param.name: clientSinkProvider
param.span: 客户端信道要使用的 实现。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the client channel.

param.name: serverSinkProvider
param.span: 服务器信道要使用的 实现。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the server channel.

summary.span: 使用指定的配置属性和接收器初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified configuration properties and sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅 [通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 信道接收器提供了一个插件点，该插件点允许访问流过通道的基础消息，以及用于将消息发送到远程对象的传输机制所使用的流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收器还负责在客户端和服务器之间传输消息。Channel sinks are also responsible for transporting messages between the client and the server. 通道接收器在链中链接在一起，并且所有通道消息在最终序列化并传输消息之前都流过此接收器链。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. 如果不需要接收器功能，请将 `clientSinkProvider` 和参数设置 `serverSinkProvider` 为 `null` 。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `clientSinkProvider` and `serverSinkProvider` parameters to `null`.

exception.span: 配置属性的格式设置不正确。

span.span: A configuration property was incorrectly formatted.

related.span: 通道和格式化程序配置属性

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer

summary.span: 获取当前信道的优先级。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 一个整数，表示分配给该信道的优先级。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 优先级控制竞争的客户端连接到给定终结点的顺序;优先级较高的通道在较低优先级通道之前连接。The priority controls the order in which competing clients connect to a given endpoint; higher priority channels connect before lower priority channels. 默认优先级为 1;允许负的优先级。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelScheme As String

value.span: 要挂钩到的侦听器类型。

span.span: The type of listener to hook into.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前属性的值不区分大小写。The value of the current property is not case-sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelSinkChain As IServerChannelSink

summary.span: 获取当前信道正在使用的信道接收器链。

span.span: Gets the channel sink chain that the current channel is using.

value.span: 当前信道正在使用的信道接收器链。

span.span: The channel sink chain that the current channel is using.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道接收器提供了一个插件点，该插件点允许访问流过通道的基础消息，以及用于将消息发送到远程对象的传输机制所使用的流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 信道接收器在通道接收器提供程序链中链接在一起，并且所有信道消息在最终序列化并传输消息之前都流过此接收器链。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回将消息传递到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object. 如果 `uri` 参数为 `null` ， `remoteChannelData` 则将用作接收器的目标。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. `url`或 `remoteChannelData` 参数可以为 `null` ，但不能同时为两者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
